name: Exorcised
description:
Become an exorcist!
Defend your city from evil demons by using cute towers designed as shrine maidens.
Fight hordes of demons using powerful Alliances and strategize your way towards victory.
Upgrade your defense after each map until you'll be able to face the root of all evil!


Key Features:

Discover!
>22 Maps for you to explore!
>3 Map themes for you to enjoy!
>14 Steam achievements for you to aim!
>10 Different tower Alliances to build your strategy on!
>5 Status effects to cripple your enemies!
>Quick and comprehensive tutorial for beginners!

Adapt!
>35 tower upgrades - become stronger!
>4 difficulty settings - pick your challenge!
>6 towers - each one is different in it's own unique way!
>2 tower upgrade paths - there is no wrong path!
>Summon demon waves early to progress faster!
>Try different combination of towers and Alliances to surprise your enemies!


Enjoy!
>Cute 3D animation and art!
>A Game Wiki containing extra lore about the demons!
>Beautiful tower and monster animations!
>High replayability!
>Game stats!
>Cloud saves!
